contents.text: Thank you for calling Plaid in San Francisco, where we enable your applications to connect seamlessly with users’ bank accounts.
For sales and partnership inquiries, press 1.
For new product demos and pricing information, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you with our sales team for demo and pricing details.

navigationGoals: Get a demo and pricing breakdown for Plaid’s latest integration platform
I’d like to schedule a product demo and get pricing details for integrating Plaid with my veterans support platform.
I’d like to schedule a live demo of your latest Plaid API suite and get a detailed breakdown of your pricing tiers.
I’d like help booking a product demo and understanding the fees
I’d like to schedule a product demo and get pricing details for student research use.

contents.text: For existing partnership account management, press 2.
Please hold while we transfer you to our partner account management team.

navigationGoals: Review and update details on my existing Plaid partnership account
I need to update settings on my existing partnership account for my veterans outreach project.
I need to review and update the configuration of my existing partner account and discuss our enterprise contract terms.
I need assistance managing my existing partnership account
I need help updating billing information on our existing partnership account.

contents.text: For developer and technical support, press 2.
One moment please while we connect you to our API support engineers.

navigationGoals: Troubleshoot my Node.js implementation of the Plaid API
I’m experiencing issues with integrating your API into my veterans assistance app and need technical support.
I’m troubleshooting my OAuth token flow in the Plaid API and want to talk to an engineer for integration support.
I need support connecting my application using your API
I’m experiencing an error with the Plaid API in my physics project and need integration support.

contents.text: For security and compliance inquiries, press 2.
One moment please while we transfer you to our security and compliance specialists.

navigationGoals: Understand Plaid’s data security and compliance requirements
I want to clarify your security and compliance requirements for handling veterans’ financial data.
I’d like to verify Plaid’s security posture, specifically your PCI DSS compliance and data encryption protocols.
I have questions about how my data is secured and regulated
I have questions about Plaid’s data security and compliance policies for academic research.
